about.introOne: Scratch je svetovno največja skupnost programerjev za otroke in s programskim jezikom z enostavnim vmesnikom, ki pomaga mladim ustvarjati digitalne zgodbe, igre in animacije. Scratch je ustvarjen, razvit in vzdrževan pri  {foundationLink}, neprofitni organziaciji.
about.introTwo: Scratch predstavlja računalniško mišljenje in reševanje problemov, kreativno poučevanje in učenje ter enakost v računalnštvu.
about.introThree: Scratch je zastonj in je na voljo v več kot 70 jezikih.
about.supportDescription1: Scratch is available for free, thanks to our {supportersLink}. This support helps us provide young people around the world with opportunities to imagine, create, and share.
about.supportDescription2: Every dollar donated gives one child access to free, playful, and powerful creative learning through the Scratch community.
about.supportDescription3: Join us in helping kids everywhere create what they imagine.
